name: Candy Heroes Legend
description:
Candy Heroes Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.

Candy Heroes Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.

How to play - Just tap on the same color candy blocks to crush them. Tap on 5 more candy blocks to generate a new candy which has a special skill!

There is a nice booster system, which supports you to solve any problem you meet in the game. By the way, the booster is also free.

One more thing, you can play the game at anywhere anytime，internet is not necessary fot it.

Game features:
1. Be friendly to ladies
2. Completely free
3. Easy to play but very interesting
4. Wonderful gaming experience
5. 1600+ levels
